title: Skeleton Builder Issue
body:
Hello!

Is there a way to plot the trajectories of specific body parts, versus all body parts?  I am using the Google Colab for training and analyzing.  This is DLC 2.2.1.

When I use `deeplabcut.create_labeled_videos` using the arguments `(path_config_file,videofile_path, videotype=VideoType, draw_skeleton= True)`, the skeleton does not show.  This is the skeleton (and the body parts) as listed in the config.yaml file.

```

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/101142209/168158495-a7ceef78-1a73-4cdd-a239-5f7415a15713.mp4


individuals:
- individual1
uniquebodyparts:
- leftofrod
- rightofrod
multianimalbodyparts:
- leftpaw
- leftankle
- leftleg
- rightpaw
- rightankle
- rightleg
- tailbase
- tail
bodyparts: MULTI!

    # Fraction of video to start/stop when extracting frames for labeling/refinement
start: 0
stop: 1
numframes2pick: 20

    # Plotting configuration
skeleton: [
  [leftpaw, leftankle], 
  [leftpaw, leftleg], 
  [leftpaw, tailbase], 
  [rightpaw, rightankle], 
  [rightpaw, rightleg], 
  [rightpaw, tailbase], 
  [tailbase, tail]
  ]
skeleton_color: white
pcutoff: 0.9
dotsize: 4
alphavalue: 0.7
colormap: rainbow

```

I get this error when I run `deeplabcut.SkeletonBuilder(path_config_file)` referenced in the [DLC Documentation](https://deeplabcut.github.io/DeepLabCut/docs/standardDeepLabCut_UserGuide.html):
```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
[<ipython-input-49-4c5fd9cfd290>](https://localhost:8080/#) in <module>()
----> 1 deeplabcut.SkeletonBuilder(path_config_file)

AttributeError: module 'deeplabcut' has no attribute 'SkeletonBuilder'

```
As seen in the screenshots below the forearms are also being detected; what outlier algorithm argument would be best to pass for this?

![Screenshot (5)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/101142209/168158967-20c5e983-bb30-42ad-9c88-c8f16f042c44.png)
![Screenshot (6)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/101142209/168158971-541a2a9e-b243-46ce-ad1c-8c7380d8d76d.png)
